actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the restriction that survivor compensation to any widow or widower will be terminated if such widow or widower remarries.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement that survivor annuities to any surviving spouse of a Federal employee be terminated upon remarriage of such surviving spouse. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8133)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to remove the restriction that survivor compensation to any widow or widower will be terminated if such widow or widower remarries.
